'use client';/* eslint-disable react-hooks/rules-of-hooks, react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */import*as React from'react';export default function useControlled(_ref){let{controlled,default:defaultProp,name,state='value'}=_ref;// isControlled is ignored in the hook dependency lists as it should never change.
